tiles.markdown: #### [ View:  [Clusters](/ui/kubernetes/) | [Namespaces](/ui/entity/list/CLOUD_APPLICATION_NAMESPACE) | [Workloads](/ui/entity/list/CLOUD_APPLICATION) | [Kubernetes Services](/ui/entity/list/KUBERNETES_SERVICE) | [Releases ](/ui/releases?filter=PROCESS_GROUP_INSTANCE-RELEASE_TAG%3D%5BKubernetes%5Dnamespace )| [PODs](/ui/entity/list/CLOUD_APPLICATION_INSTANCE) | [Logs](/ui/log-monitoring?query=event.type%3D"k8s") | [Traces](/ui/diagnostictools/purepaths?gtf=-2h&gf=all&servicefilter=0%1E48%11%5BKubernetes%5Dnamespace) | [Dashboards](/ui/dashboards?gtf=-2h&gf=all&filters=tag%3DKubernetes)] ☉ [ Anomaly Detection: [Cluster](/ui/settings/builtin:anomaly-detection.kubernetes.cluster) | [Node](/ui/settings/builtin:anomaly-detection.kubernetes.node) | [Namespace](/ui/settings/builtin:anomaly-detection.kubernetes.namespace) | [Workload](/ui/settings/builtin:anomaly-detection.kubernetes.workload) | [PVC](/ui/settings/builtin:anomaly-detection.kubernetes.pvc) ]  ☉ [ [Alerting profiles](/ui/settings/builtin:alerting.profile) | [Management zones](/ui/settings/builtin:management-zones)][ Deployment: [connect new cluster ](/ui/deployment/oneagent/kubernetes) ]
